name: Tokyo Tour For Muslim Tourists
description: If you are Muslim, you might have some concerns about maintaining your customs during your stay in Tokyo. We have a tour designed just for you! In our tour, we will direct you to a halal restaurant for lunch and a chance to pray in the afternoon. Our guide will take you to a mosque where you can pray just as you do at home. When you choose our tour, you can enjoy major sightseeing spots in Tokyo and still uphold your customs.
